recommendations: Pranav Shukla “ “ I've known Shubham sir for over a year now. We’ve joined our hands on several projects, and I can comfortably say that he's one of the best people I have had the chance to work with. He is a helpful guy, easy to approach and always has a bigger vision in mind. He remains calm and collected under pressure and most importantly, knows the value of holding a team together. Honest, genuine, dependable, creative and low-key. These perfectly describe his composure. I honestly believe that he'll be an important and much appreciated part of any team that he chooses to be a apart of. Best of luck for your future! ” ”

Kanishk Rao “I have worked with Shubham in various clubs, projects, & competitions and he has not let me down in a single one of them both as a leader and a team member. He has a problem-solving attitude with a legend like knowledge of Finance. He is the person I can trust with anything. Shubham is the one who gets things done. I am not just saying this, He even won a hackathon in which he prepared the idea and presentation during the time when others were presenting, I know he is awesome.”

          The event is focused to bring the online community to offline spaces so that like-minded people can interact, connect and help each other better.The LinkedIn community of NIT Jalandhar is uplifted through this team and we keep in check that networking and profiling are easy, convenient and fun for students of NIT-J. Organised Linkedin local 1.0, the first Professional Meet-up in Jalandhar, in which responsible for following tasks1. Writing the invitation and marketing content2. Marketing Campaign in NIT Jalandhar3. Hospitality of the guest, so to make them feel at home.
